ygData.subject: RE: Hmm..trying to get back to cleric questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: *laugh* I had some trouble doing it in that I had to go from dubious to good amiable in quyenos. Not that difficult, but time consuming. Cleanse does exactly
ygData.messageBody:
*laugh*
I had some trouble doing it in that I had to go from dubious to good
amiable in quyenos. Not that difficult, but time consuming.

Cleanse does exactly what you described. Random cleaning effect which
is nice in places like befallen where there are a ton of DoT spells and
disease from undead.

You can get the mace recharged in the store room in Quyenos by someone
whose name sarts with W something(since I am at work i don't have my
notes :))

20pp? *sigh* Once more back to collecting silver pieces to save enough
for my spells.

On another note, the delivering the note to the paladin in splitpaw
quest, is a great quest for people in their higher teens, since on
completion you receive a random clerical spell from levels 19, 24, or
29. This has saved me a fair amount of money already.


> Clerics have a hard time doing the quest? LOL i am
> a human cleric and had
> no troule doing said quest, in fact it was one of
> the easier ones i have
> done. Now for my question, what exactly does clense
> do? I was under the
> impression that it took of negitive effects on the
> player, tho it always
> seems to clense me when i dont need it, and there
> are only 30 charges on it.
> I have no clue how to get it recharged. I am a
> lvl 24 cleric on Xegony,
> and am now using a screaming mace which i perfer,
> the SSoL was nice, fast,
> and consistant in the amount of damg it did, but the
> effect was wasted on my
> toon as i never seem to get many neg effects on me.
> Suffice it to say I
> gave my SSoL to a noobie that was begging, LOL he
> loved it and i was happy
> to help, as far as what it is worth, i have no clue
> as i would pay nothing
> over 20p for it and thats going above the value to
> me. It's prob worth alot
> to ppl who want them badly and less to others that
> don't. just INHO, stay
> safe and have fun
>
>
